word_mean: 吻合：在原先分离的结构间造一通路以事连结

sentence.Network_en: The most common complications were cardiopulmonary insufficiency, lung infection, atelectasis pain and anastomose fistula in thorax.
sentence.Network_cn: 常见的并发症有心律失常 、 肺部感染 、 肺不张、疼痛、胸腔内吻合口瘘等.

sentence.Network_en: Hepatic veins should be reconstructed if necessary, so as to anastomose with recipient inferior vena cava.
sentence.Network_cn: 移植前肝静脉需行必要的整形, 以便与受体静脉进行吻合.

means.word_mean: 1. come together or open into each other;
2. cause to join or open into each other by anastomosis;
